attributes.action: bring the lawful age of driving down to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: young people in rural areas especially cant get around very much so if the driving age is dropped to 16 it is a lot better. People can get from A to B without nagging their parents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
